General.Name: SJM Co Ltd
General.Description: SJM Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile and industrial products in Korea and internationally. It offers non-self supporting and self supporting products; and crossover joints products. The company was formerly known as Sung Jin Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SJM Co., Ltd. in November 1996. SJM Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is based in Ansan, South Korea.
